content:
TASK RESULT 3-3: BROWSE Endpoint Implementation

STATUS: BLOCKED (partial implementation complete)

COMPLETED:
1. Created crates/notebook-server/src/routes/browse.rs
2. Implemented GET /notebooks/{id}/browse endpoint structure
3. Added BrowseParams (query, max_tokens) and BrowseResponse structs
4. Integrated CatalogGenerator from notebook-entropy for catalog generation
5. Implemented simple text-based search fallback when Tantivy not available
6. Modified routes/mod.rs to include browse module

BLOCKER:
notebook-entropy crate has a compile error in search.rs (lines 332, 345):
- Missing import: use tantivy::schema::Value;
- The as_str() method requires the Value trait to be in scope
- This blocks full Tantivy search integration

WORKAROUND:
Implemented simple text matching for query parameter:
- Matches against entry content (for text/* types)
- Matches against entry topic
- Returns query_matches count in response

FILES CREATED/MODIFIED:
- crates/notebook-server/src/routes/browse.rs (NEW)
- crates/notebook-server/src/routes/mod.rs (MODIFIED)

API SPECIFICATION:
GET /notebooks/{id}/browse?query={optional}&max_tokens={optional}

Response:
{
  "catalog": [{topic, summary, entry_count, cumulative_cost, stability, representative_entry_ids}],
  "notebook_entropy": f64,
  "total_entries": u32,
  "query_matches": usize  // Only if query provided
}

TO UNBLOCK:
Task 3-2 (Tantivy search) needs to fix the missing import in notebook-entropy/src/search.rs:
  Add: use tantivy::schema::Value;

ONCE UNBLOCKED:
Update browse.rs to use SearchIndex instead of simple text matching.
author: anonymous
